thread.title: Jamie Carragher Trolls Gary Neville On Social Media Once Again
thread.title_full: Jamie Carragher Trolls Gary Neville On Social Media Once Again

title: Jamie Carragher Trolls Gary Neville On Social Media Once Again
text:
Jamie Carragher Trolls Gary Neville On Social Media Once Again Wed Feb 08 2017 20:57:21   20:57:21 GMT+0000 (GMT) Nasir Jabbar Nasir Jabbar in football 
Gary Neville and Jamie Carragher's friendship is built on by constantly taking the piss out of each other with the banter between the pair in the public domain. 
The Monday Night Football colleagues have taken their bromance outside the onscreen barbs that they love to swap and taken it to the social media sphere. 
(WATCH: Neville on Arsene Wenger and Arsenal fan TV) 
(Video courtesy of Sky Sports) 
And tonight, Carragher has once again got the better of his Sky colleague by savagely commenting on his Instagram post while at the barbers. A photo posted by Gary Neville (@gneville2) on Feb 7, 2017 at 9:21am PST 
Providing the perfect opportunity for Carragher who commented by saying; "See if she can take a bit off your nose." 
BURN! 
Expect Neville to get his own back soon. Very soon! Sponsored Links
